string.value: #b#@9201120:##k in #bKerning City#k says he might have seen something strange near the Water Pipe.

He says he might have seen something strange near the Water Pipe.\nLet's go over to #b#m102050000##k and inspect the Fire Hydrants. Report back to #b#@9201120:##k in #bKerning City#k when you find the clue.
Someone had been spreading the virus through the Water Pipe. There must be some twisted figure behind all of this!

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 2000 Able to proceed to 'To Perion!' as next quest.

A few months back, I was inspecting the Water Pipe when I saw a suspicious shadow lingering around the area. I just assumed it was a wild animal and didn't think twice about it.\n\nNow that I think about it...

I think the shadow was more like that of a monster than a wild animal. When I rushed over, the shadow had already disappeared. I didn't really think it was a big deal, but now that I really think about it, it could be tied to the virus!

If something or someone had really done something to the water--oh, I don't even want to think about it! Can you rush over to the Fire Hydrants and inspect it as soon as possible? You'll find the Fire Hydrants in #b#m102050000##k.
How unexpected! I thought you'd be curious.
You're pretty fast. Let's see what clues you've gathered.

This is an emblem that could only be found in ancient documents. I'm sure you can find someone who knows a lot about something like this.\n\nSince you've worked so hard to find the clue, come back and see me after you get some rest.
